name: Nikplace
description: Under the slogan "Grand Trust, Hold on Relationship," NIKPLACE wants to give people trust by adding blockchain technology to the existing method. To this end, we launched the NIKPLACE project to overcome the limitations of this field by introducing blockchain technology to the art and content fields that cannot be separated from humans. We also want to create a NIKSPACE ecosystem by expanding NIK Coin and NIKX NFT technologies in all areas of life, including TELEDOCTOR & PETDOCTOR, which supports blockchain technology for non-face-to-face medical care for humans and animals, and PAYREFUN, an easy and useful smart year-end settlement accounting app.
